MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:09pm due to damaged electrical equipment on Mansefield Court. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:16pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021
